short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that instantly generates AI-powered answers to your questions using Google's Gemini API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing SnapAnswer – Your AI-Powered Knowledge Assistant!

Ever struggled to find the exact information you need while browsing a website, reading a PDF, or watching a YouTube video? Meet SnapAnswer, a revolutionary Google Chrome extension that simplifies your browsing experience with the power of AI!

With SnapAnswer, you can:
    •    Ask questions directly on any website and get instant answers.
    •    Analyze PDFs viewed in your browser—no downloads or extra tools required!
    •    Understand YouTube videos by asking questions about the content without watching the entire video.
    •    Save time and effort by letting AI do the reading, summarizing, and analyzing for you.

Download SnapAnswer today and unlock the future of smart browsing!
